documentation.text: @title ZorroControllerBase: The base controller with main state variables, data types, and functions
@notice Only allows functions to be executed where the sender matches the zorroPriceOracle address
@notice Only allows functions to be executed on contracts matching the home chain controller
@notice Can only be called on non home chain

@notice Setter: Burn address
 @param _burnAddress The burn address on this chain
@notice Setter: Start block for rewards
@notice Setter: Set controller actions contract address

@notice Setter: TVL capture (See Tokenomics paper)
 @param _targetTVLCaptureBasisPoints Percent of market desired to be captured, in bp. 333 = 3.33%. ONLY to be set on the home chain

@notice Setter: Set Zorro Controller Oracle
 @param _zorroControllerOracle Address of Chainlink oracle that can interact with this contract

documentation.text:
@notice Stores cumulative total of minted rewards on a non-home chain, for future burning.
 @param _mintedRewards Amount of rewards that were minted

@notice Resets accumulated synthentic rewards minted
 @dev To be called by Oracle only, when batch burning synthetic minted rewards

@notice Stores cumulative total of slashed rewards on a non-home chain, for future burning.
 @param _slashedRewards Amount of rewards that were minted

@notice Resets accumulated synthentic rewards minted
 @dev To be called by Oracle only, when batch burning synthetic minted rewards

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).details: Does not permit usage for the Zorro token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

resetSyntheticRewardsMinted().details: To be called by Oracle only, when batch burning synthetic minted rewards

resetSyntheticRewardsSlashed().details: To be called by Oracle only, when batch burning synthetic minted rewards

params._burnAddress: The burn address on this chain

setRewardsParams(uint256,uint256[],uint2.details: NOTE: Must enter all parameters or existing ones will be overwritten!

params._baseRewardRateBasisPoints: Base reward rate factor, in bp
params._blocksPerDay: # of blocks per day for this chain
params._chainMultiplier: Rewards multiplier factor to be applied to this chain

params._targetTVLCaptureBasisPoints: Percent of market desired to be captured, in bp. 333 = 3.33%. ONLY to be set on the home chain

params._chainId: The ind of the chain that this contract is on
params._homeChainId: The chain ID of the home chain
params._homeChainZorroController: The address of the home chain controller

params._zorroControllerOracle: Address of Chainlink oracle that can interact with this contract

setZorroPerBlock(uint256,uint256,uint256.details: Values to be provided by Oracle. Perferable to run daily

params._ZorroTotalVaultTVLUSD: USD value of all TVL locked into the Zorro protocol, across all chains
params._publicPoolZORBalance: Number of ZOR tokens remaining in public pool on home chain
params._targetTVLCaptureBasisPoints: % desired capture of total market TVL, measured in basis points
params._totalChainMultipliers: Sum total of all chain multipliers for each chain
params._totalMarketTVLUSD: Total DeFi market TVL across all chains (measured in USD)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

returns.mintedZOR: Amount of ZOR rewards minted (useful for cross chain)
